title: Media silenced by phone calls on Do Not Disturb mode
content:
Media is silenced by phone calls and other app calls on Do Not Disturb mode.
It only does this when playing through bluetooth or USB-C cable. I have read all posts on the internet, tried all settings, exhausted all options with chat support, bug reports have been made by others, I submitted feedback as well, a ton of people have experienced this bug for years. If it's a hardware issue someone from google should clarify.
https://www.reddit.com/r/GooglePixel/comments/buqmtg/notificationringermedia_volume_bug/
https://www.reddit.com/r/GooglePixel/comments/buvbjr/with_the_pixel_2_is_anyone_else_having_a_problem/

Not sure if this is the cause
https://issuetracker.google.com/issues/134214639
